pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, July 5, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario

Private meetings.

11:10 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with the Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry François-Philippe Champagne, will tour the Algoma Steel Inc. facility.

Algoma Steel Inc.
No. 2 Gate, Administration Building
105 West Street

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:30 a.m., and to report to Emergency Services at No. 2 Gate.
  • Long sleeves, long pants, steel-toed safety boots, and a non-medical mask are mandatory. Other personal protective equipment (hard hat, safety glasses, and hearing protection) will be provided.

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with the Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry François-Philippe Champagne, will make an announcement and hold a media availability.

Algoma Steel Inc.
No. 2 Gate, Administration Building
105 West Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:30 a.m. and report to  Emergency Services at No. 2 Gate.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit Shingwauk Kinoomaage Gamig Centre of Excellence in Anishinaabe Education.

1550 Queen Street East
Center of Excellence in Anishinaabe Education

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:40 p.m.
